thread.title: You’ll Be Amazed When You See What Arnold Schwarzenegger’s Grown Kids Look Like Now!
thread.title_full: You’ll Be Amazed When You See What Arnold Schwarzenegger’s Grown Kids Look Like Now!

author: Mandy Kennedy
title: You’ll Be Amazed When You See What Arnold Schwarzenegger’s Grown Kids Look Like Now!
text:
Over 3 million people just like you 'Like' us » Like it? Share it! 255 Shares Arnold Schwarzenegger might be known first and foremost for his iconic roles in action movies, but he's quietly raised five children both in and out of marriage. via: Diply 
The Terminator and Total Recall star’s relationship and split with wife Maria Shriver was public, but his kids have largely stayed out of the public eye until recently. 
See what they look like all grown up. It’s amazing how much some of them take after Mom while others look like Dad. Arnie famously moved to America when he was just twenty-one years old. via: Diply His early career was focused more on bodybuilding than acting, but in the early '80s, after being named Mr. Olympia, he began to make the transition to the big screen.
